snippet.title: Windstorm: The Legend of Khiimori Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Windstorm: The Legend of Khiimori and unravel the mystery of the "wind horse". Cultivate your Mongolian nomad camp and complete missions to build your legacy as an ancient courier rider. Tame and train horses with specialized abilities to explore every aspect of a diverse landscape.

Windstorm: The Legend of Khiimori Early Access is coming to PC in September.

Wishlist now! https://www.windstorm-game.com/

----------

Steam Store:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2697000/Windstorm_The_Legend_of_Khiimori/

Instagram: https://instagram.com/PlayWindstorm
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@PlayWindstorm
Twitter / 𝕏: https://twitter.com/PlayWindstorm

Discord: https://discord.gg/AesirInteractive
Aesir Interactive: https://www.aesir-interactive.com

#windstorm #ostwind #announcement
